mapper.insert: insert into sys_featured ( title, content, url, heat, stars, sequence, addtime, uptime, status ) values ( #{title}, #{content}, #{url}, #{heat}, #{stars}, #{sequence}, #{addtime}, #{uptime}, #{status} )
